history.proof: unfold Rbar_plus. destruct x. - simpl. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rplus_0_r. - qsimpl time: 1 use: Rbar_finite_eq,Rplus_0_r. - sfirstorder depth: 3use: Rbar_finite_eq, Rplus_0_r.

exceptions.exn: In environment r : R Unable to unify "?M2288 + 0 = ?M2288" with "r + 0 = r".
Unable to unify "(?M2302 = ?M2303 -> ?M2302 = ?M2303) /\\ (?M2302 = ?M2303 -> ?M2302 = ?M2303)" with "match Rbar_plus' p_infty 0 with | Some z => z | None => 0 end = p_infty".

original: unfold Rbar_plus. destruct x. - simpl. f_equal. apply Rplus_0_r. - apply Rbar_finite_eq. simpl. rewrite Rplus_0_r. reflexivity. - apply Rbar_finite_eq. reflexivity.
